macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: Raw response
items.summary: [{"title":"US Major Indices Drift Lower on Friday Close","summary":"The S&P 500 closed at 6,939.95 (-0.1%), Nasdaq Composite at 23,515.39 (-0.1%), and Dow Jones at 49,359.33 (-0.2%), reflecting cautious sentiment ahead of earnings and with US markets closed for MLK Day. crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Network Hashrate Hits Lowest Level Since September 2025
items.summary: Bitcoin's network hashrate dropped to its lowest since September 2025 amid broader market declines. The global crypto market cap stands at $3.22T, up slightly by 0.04%, but BTC trades at $93,076, down 2.22%.[1]

items.title: Crypto Markets Slide Nearly 3% with Bitcoin Below $93K
items.summary: Bitcoin fell 2.89% below $93,000 and Ethereum dropped 3.18% under $3,200 as selling pressure hit major sectors. GameFi led losses at 8.58%, with IMX, SAND, and GALA posting double-digit declines.[2]

items.title: January 19 Crypto Crash: $763M Liquidations Trigger Panic
items.summary: Over $763M in long positions liquidated in 12 hours due to macro risks, Trump's tariff threats, and Fed uncertainty, pushing Bitcoin below $91,920 and Ethereum under $3,200. Whale holders reduced positions, amplifying the downturn.[3]

items.title: Bitcoin Drops Sharply $4K in Minutes Below $93K
items.summary: Bitcoin price plunged around $4,000 in minutes after a stable weekend, signaling a market correction following last week's gains. Major altcoins like SOL (-6.02%), DOGE (-7%), and ADA (-6.10%) also declined.[5][1]

items.title: Major Altcoin Declines: GameFi and Layer 1 Sectors Bleed
items.summary: Layer 1 and Layer 2 sectors fell 4.8% and 6.7%, with top losers including SOL (-6.02%), DOGE (-7%), and XRP (-3.92%). Outperformers were DUSK (+137%), SCRT (+33%), and PIVX (+23%).[1][2]

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Crunch Opens Bittensor Decentralized AI Mining to Academic and Enterprise ML Scientists
items.summary: Crunch launched a meta-modeling layer for Bittensor subnets, enabling academic and enterprise ML scientists to participate in decentralized AI mining by abstracting blockchain complexity and focusing on model development.

items.title: Pearson Research: AI Won't Lift Productivity Without Skilling, Could Add $6.6T to US Economy by 2034
items.summary: New Pearson report released at Davos finds that pairing AI with employee skilling could add $4.8T to $6.6T to the US economy by 2034, highlighting a 'learning gap' as the key barrier to realizing AI's productivity potential.

items.title: USF-Led Study Uses AI to Reveal Global Surge in Floating Algae
items.summary: Researchers at University of South Florida and NOAA used AI to conduct the first global study of floating algae, processing vast ocean data to show a surge in macroalgal mats and microalgal scum.

items.title: Edge AI Market Set to Reach $143 Billion by 2034 with Focus on Inference
items.summary: The edge AI market is projected to grow to $143B by 2034, driven by advancements in energy-efficient processors, IoT proliferation, and a shift from AI training to inference for low-latency applications in manufacturing and automotive.

items.title: AZIO AI Acquires Azio Corp's AI Division
items.summary: AZIO AI entered a definitive agreement to acquire Azio Corp's AI division, expanding its capabilities in machine learning and AI technologies.

items.title: EuroHPC Regulation Amended to Boost Europe's AI and Quantum Capabilities
items.summary: The European Commission amended EuroHPC regulations to strengthen Europe's AI and quantum computing infrastructure.

items.title: Study Shows Quantum Computers Can Compare Meaning in Language Models
items.summary: New research demonstrates quantum computers' ability to analyze and compare semantic meaning in AI language models.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Fortnite Ballistic v37.10 Update Adds Veiled Precision SMG and Deployable Wall Gadget
items.summary: Epic Games released Fortnite Ballistic v37.10, introducing the Veiled Precision SMG, Deployable Wall Gadget, and more content. The update coincides with Fortnite Crew January 2026 featuring Gale.[2]

items.title: Fortnite Battle Royale Chapter Seven: Pacific Break Trailers Released
items.summary: New trailers for Fortnite Battle Royale Chapter Seven: Pacific Break have been unveiled, including gameplay and cinematic previews. South Park collaboration 'Born in Chaos' also drops into Fortnite.[2]

items.title: Granblue Fantasy Versus Rising Ilsa Gameplay Trailer and Tournaments Announced
items.summary: A new Ilsa gameplay trailer for Granblue Fantasy Versus Rising was released, alongside upcoming tournaments on January 24th in NA and EU. Community PC lobbies and F2P rotations are active.[1]

items.title: LEGO Fortnite Odysseys Ninjago Update: Master Your True Potential
items.summary: Fortnite's LEGO mode receives the Ninjago update, allowing players to master their true potential with new content.[2]

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: India Post Delivers First Online Order via ONDC Platform
items.summary: The Department of Posts successfully delivered its first-ever online order through the Open Network for Digital Commerce (ONDC), marking its entry as a Logistics Service Provider on the platform.

items.title: 2026 Digital Work Plan Approved for India-ASEAN ICT Collaboration
items.summary: A meeting approved a comprehensive 2026 Digital Work Plan focused on ICT training, capacity building, India-ASEAN Regulators’ Conference, and deployment of telecom ICT solutions; the ASEAN-India Fund was also operationalized for digital transformation projects.

items.title: Galgotias University Inaugurates IIT Mandi Catalyst Satellite Centre
items.summary: Galgotias University, ranked among leading global universities, inaugurated the IIT Mandi Catalyst Satellite Centre at its Greater Noida campus to foster innovation and technology development.

items.title: PTC'26 Conference Kicks Off in Honolulu Focusing on Telecom and Digital Infrastructure
items.summary: The PTC'26 event began January 18-21 in Honolulu, Hawaii, exploring convergence of digital infrastructure, telecommunications, ICT, satellite systems, and sustainability in networking technologies.

items.title: National Startup Day 2026 Celebrated with Awards Unveiling
items.summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi addressed startup founders at National Startup Day event in New Delhi, where DPIIT unveiled results of the 5th National Startup Awards (NSA 5.0) and SRF 5.0, highlighting over 2 lakh recognized startups in sectors like fintech and agritech.
